GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR SRI LANKA
ජාතික කාලගුණ විදයා මධ්‍යස්ථානහේ, අනාවැකි අංශය මගින් නිකුත් කරන ලදි

2023 සැප්තැම්බර් මස 26 දින්‍ සඳහා කාලගුණ අන්‍ාවැකිය
2023 සැප්තැම්බර් මස 26 දින්‍ උදෑසන්‍ 05.30 ට නිකුත්කරන්‍ ලදි.

ය

WEATHER FORECAST FOR 26 SEPTEMBER 2023
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 26 September 2023
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  times  in  Western,  Sabaragamuwa  and  North-
western provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

A
 few showers may occur in Jaffna and Anuradhapura districts.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Central, Uva and Eastern provinces
and in Polonnaruwa and Mullaitivu districts during the evening or night.

G
eneral public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.

Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
